title: Southern Charm Reunion Part 2 Recap! We Made It To The End!
itunes:title: Southern Charm Reunion Part 2 Recap! We Made It To The End!
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps the final part of this season's Southern Charm reunion, which features appearances by Danni, Madison, and Eliza. Danny also touches on Bethenny, his fave instagram account, and more!*To support this pod & access bonus episodes,...
description:
Danny recaps the final part of this season's Southern Charm reunion, which features appearances by Danni, Madison, and Eliza. Danny also touches on Bethenny, his fave instagram account, and more!


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
